name: lone survivor (itch) (Davis Productions)
description:
you are a lone survivor traveling to reach safety from the radiation and mutated freaks. travel through various locations to get to the safe zone!

Features :

. unique and atmospheric levels ranging from a city, to a forest, to a swamp and more!  

.an atmospheric first person shooter

. detailed levels!

. very ambient soundtracks for each level!

. easy ,normal, hard modes !  

. easy=well easy , normal= more of a challenge, hard= well hard!

. parkour mode a mode with out any enemies ! just jump and run to the destination!

. horde mode a mode with swarms of enemies!

Quick note: don't forget to save when done playing a level!

development note: 

compare this game to my others and it will show a more polished and developed game! I hope who ever plays this game will see the progress i have made! Also delivering more content! I hope all who play this game will enjoy it!
